childMarkdownRemark.html: Our team will do everything possible to improve and maintain a tree’s health. We’ll do what is right for every tree.
childMarkdownRemark.excerpt: Our team will do everything possible to improve and maintain a tree’s health. We’ll do what is right for every tree.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Naturally, trees have a hard time acclimating to our urban environments and high desert climate. In a forest, decomposing leaves and fallen twigs supply the tree with essential nutrients and unneeded branches are pruned off by Mother Nature. But that is not the case with urban trees. They often compete with lawns and shrubs for nutrients and branches grow in directions that aren’t desired.

We understand trees and we know exactly what they need to thrive and succeed in an urban setting. Rooted deep within us is the belief that in order to provide tree care, you have to actually care about the tree. Our mission is simple. Do what is right for the tree. Our goal is to leave the tree better than we found it. Our team will do everything possible to improve the tree’s health and prolong its life.
